newsitem.title: USA: Great American Bancorp to buy back shares.
newsitem.headline: Great American Bancorp to buy back shares.

text.p: Great American Bancorp Inc said Friday it has received regulatory clearance to purchase up to five percent of its outstanding common stock, or 97,506 shares .
The company said its board of directors authorized the repurchase August 12.

Stock repurchases under the program will be made in open market transactions, subject to the availability of stock. The buybacks will commence soon after the release of the company's earnings for the quarter ending September 30, the company said.
